original_text: For this reason, therefore, I have asked to see you and speak with you, since it is because of the hope of Israel that I am wearing this chain.”
korean_text: 이러므로 너희를 보고 함께 이야기하려고 청하였으니 이스라엘의 소망으로 말미암아 내가 이 쇠사슬에 매인 바 되었노라

sentences.original_text: I have asked to see you and speak with you,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신을 만나 말씀드리고자 청한 것은,

sentences.original_text: since it is because of the hope of Israel
that I am wearing this chain.”
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이 쇠사슬을 차고 있는 것입니다.”
